About me

A short intro...

Vem är Diyar Faraj?

Who is Diyar Faraj?

Hey! I am a developer focused on creating amazing web experiences. Coding has been my great passion since my univeristy education. I like to create beautifully designed, intuitive and functional websites. The tools I use are JavaScript, Node and .Net.

In addition to development, I like to workout every day and watch/play football.
          
A list of my favorite podcasts, movies and books.

Frontend @Parttrap AB

Fulltime working as a web developer and Application Consultant at Parttrap in Gothenburg.

E-Commerce Developer @KOCHI Haircare

Part time working as E-commerce developer with my brother's startup, KOCHI Haircare.
